content.body: nicolo-ribaudo: per the JSON modules spec, should `video/lottie+json` be accepted as a valid JSON module? It seems like in HTML it should. I ran a quick test in Chrome and this didn't seem to be the case.
content.formatted_body: nicolo-ribaudo: per the JSON modules spec, should video/lottie+json be accepted as a valid JSON module? It seems like in HTML it should. I ran a quick test in Chrome and this didn't seem to be the case.

content.body: ahh it seems this was a recently fixed Chrome bug
Yeah it should work because it's a JSON mime type
